  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "General Manager",
  "description": "At Eastern &amp; Western Hospital, we offer both orthodox and alternative medicine. We have unique ideas/techniques for health. At E.W.H, with our team of well trained and experience doctors, health cases are treated with ease.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;General Manager
Job Location:&nbsp;Abuja
Job&nbsp;type: Full-time
Reports directly to: Board of Directors / CEO

Position Summary


	The General Manager (GM) is responsible for overseeing all aspects of Eastern &amp; Western Hospital&rsquo;s operations - including finance, administration, marketing, human resources, customer relations, and public engagement &mdash; and reports directly to the Board of Directors.
	This is a multi-tasking leadership role that requires supervision, strategic guidance, and innovative thinking to ensure continuous optimization and growth of the hospital.


Key Responsibilities
Finance:


	Supervise all financial transactions and documentation.
	Ensure patients&rsquo; payments are properly recorded in the hospital software by cashiers.
	Work closely with hospital management to prepare and maintain budgets, monitor expenses, and ensure cost control.
	Track profitability and financial performance metrics.


Administration:


	Oversee smooth workflow across all hospital departments, including Nursing, Admin, and Accounts.
	Ensure an efficient patient triage system at the reception to enhance client satisfaction.
	Enforce staff discipline, adherence to hospital policies, and compliance with relevant laws and regulations.
	Maintain a clean, safe, and standard hospital environment; ensure prompt maintenance, repairs, and facility improvements.
	Oversee record-keeping, procurement, and inventory control &mdash; ensuring consumables arewell-documented and replenished on time.
	Compile periodic business performance statistics and submit reports to the CEO.


Human Resources:


	Manage staff recruitment, deployment, and payroll supervision.
	Organize staff schedules, ensure efficient duty rosters, and maintain healthy staff relations.
	Conduct basic training, mentorship, and periodic team-building activities.
	Ensure fair performance evaluation and adherence to HR policies.


Marketing &amp; Publicity:


	Develop and implement creative strategies to attract new clients and retain existing ones.
	Coordinate hospital branding, publicity, and digital presence, including website and social media optimization.
	Design marketing materials (flyers, posts, announcements) and lead promotional campaigns.
	Participate in community and partnership outreach to enhance the hospital&rsquo;s visibility and reputation.


Customer Service &amp; Public Relations:


	Ensure high-quality service delivery and adherence to professional dress codes and client-handling standards.
	Maintain effective communication and relationships with government agencies, regulatory bodies, and key stakeholders.
	Oversee patient follow-up diaries and ensure timely appointment reminders and customer engagement.
	Handle client feedback and complaints professionally to improve satisfaction.


Environment &amp; Facility Management:


	Supervise housekeeping, sanitation, and waste management activities to maintain a hygienic environment.
	Oversee maintenance of hospital equipment, facilities, and utilities, ensuring they are functional and safe for use.
	Monitor repair schedules and coordinate with technicians for timely maintenance.


Core Areas of Focus:


	Human Resources: Scheduling, staff relations, and training.
	Administration: Record-keeping, procurement, and public interface.
	Finance: Cost analysis, revenue tracking, and profit management.
	Customer Service: Quality assurance and service excellence.
	Environment: Cleanliness and safety compliance.
	Facility &amp; Equipment: Maintenance and functionality.
	Marketing &amp; Sales: Publicity, contract supply sales, and promotional strategies.


Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree (Master&rsquo;s preferred); education or professional experience in developed countries is an added advantage.
	Proven leadership and communication skills.
	Basic accounting knowledge and familiarity with database systems.
	Strong computer proficiency, especially in Microsoft Excel (use of formulas for payroll, invoicing, and reporting).
	Excellent organizational and management abilities, with a problem-solving mindset.
	Demonstrated innovation, creativity, and initiative in improving operations.


Salary
N750,000 - N1,000,000 / month.

Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send in their CV to:&nbsp;ewhhumanresource@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",
